dict.acceptation: 严肃的，严重的；认真的，庄重的；重要的；危险的；

sent.orig: Radio 3 broadcasts serious music, talks on serious subjects etc.
sent.trans: 频道3播放严肃音乐，严肃话题等。

sent.orig: The coach is serious about this and I understand his view. But I am serious, too.
sent.trans: 主教练对这件事很认真，而我也明白他的看法。

sent.orig: Yet symptoms that are not as serious for adult may be more serious for a child.
sent.trans: 故对于成人而言，并不很严重的症状出现在儿童身上则可能会严重得多。

sent.orig: The serious and extremely serious fire cases reduced by 78.3% and 75% than the previous year.
sent.trans: 重大、特大火灾分别比上年下降了78.3％和75％。

sent.orig: Aggravated assault is assaulted cause serious injury or carry out in connection with another serious crime.
sent.trans: 严惩威胁侵犯他人身体罪是一种造成严重伤害的威胁侵犯他人身体罪，或与另一个严重犯罪同时发生。
